name: Let's Get This Bread
description:
A prototype game based upon Pac-Man updated for users to play as a jam jar, avoid butter knives, and collect slices of bread for the ultimate video jamming experience!

Use the arrow keys to move and select the escape key to end the game early.

Credits:

Game Design & Programming: Riley Zuckert & Kyle McLemore

Art: Ria Upreti

Music:

Upbeat Forever Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
